Wang, and Muhammad Shoaib, “UAV-enabled data acquisition scheme with directional wireless energy transfer for Internet of Things,” Computer Communications (SCI IF=6 in 2022, JCR Q1), vol. 155, pp. 184-196, March 2020, DOI: 10.1016/j.comcom.2020.03.020.
